name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience designing and developing high-performance web applications, primarily utilizing **React**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**. Proficient in modern frontend development frameworks and tools, ensuring exceptional user experiences aligned with Agile methodologies. Strong background in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles to create maintainable and scalable code.
Demonstrated ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, translating design assets from **Figma** into responsive and interactive user interfaces. Possesses a robust skill set in full stack development, with hands-on experience in **Python**, **Flutter**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in integrating cloud services and implementing CI/CD pipelines, contributing to efficient delivery processes. Committed to maintaining compliance with industry standards to ensure secure and reliable applications.
